# 머릿말

```{r webr-preface}
library(tidyverse)
webr_preface <- read_rds("data/webr_preface.rds")

# print(strwrap(webr_preface, width = 120))
webr_preface_tbl <- tribble( ~"머릿말",
                             webr_preface)
webr_preface_tbl %>% 
  reactable::reactable()
```

# 목차 

```{r webr-toc}
webr_toc_tbl  <-  read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/webr_toc_tbl.rds"))

webr_toc_tbl %>% 
  reactable::reactable()
```
